contest-event.event-date:
July 30, 1927 D Worksop Contest
Worksop Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
worksop-contest
None
Il Flauto Magico [unknown arranger]
Worksop, Nottinghamshire Promoted by Worksop Silver Prize Band
Prizes 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £7 and shield, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest - 1st(£1.10s.) Pleasley , 2nd (£1) Yorkshire Main, 3rd Bentley. 3rd annual contest. 9 bands competed.
Sept. 23, 2013, 12:26 p.m. March 16, 2018, 4:28 p.m.
1 Goldthorpe Band Thomas Allsopp
2 Pleasley Colliery Welfare Band Bert Lambeth
3 Hickleton Main Welfare T. Hunter
4 B Winning and Blackwell Colliery T. F. Ward
5 Bentley Colliery W. Wormald
Unknown Result Dinnington Colliery Band Unknown
